channel.title: Adding hp orbs/prayer
channel.description:
Can anyone please help me add them? tried like 20 times and still aint able to get it. this is the website i used but i cant do it still. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/tutorials/317256-adding-hp-prayer-orbs.html
Edit: i did them all of them.. I think imjust having troubles with the sprites.
